experience: You and Kathy both know Armando Viteri, Shay Pausa, and 16 others
You both worked at EPIC Research and Diagnostics
You both worked at EPIC Research and Diagnostics from Jun 2013 to Aug 2013

New Horizons is a consulting firm that specializes in assisting small companies target and achieve their financial and operational goals.   This can be accomplished through a number of strategies: either project oriented engagements, or through temporarily augmenting your executive leadership team.  As the CEO for New Horizons, I have served a number of clients in the public and private sector (both for and not for profit enterprises).  These contracts have included serving as an interim CFO for both public and private organizations, one of which was LifeLock prior to its IPO in 2012.  Services provided to my clients have included:  raising capital, installing financial reporting and controls, leading efforts  in preparation for IPO's as well as assisting in total financial restructuring following Chapter 11 proceedings.If you are in need of a seasoned financial professional who is also a hands on leader, please contact me at Kathy@NMMCI.com.

In addition to serving as a Director, and committee member for our Nominating and Governance Committee, I am also temporarily serving as the Company's Interim Chief Financial Officer to assist the Company in raising capital, and developing the financial and operational structures to position for future growth.
I continued to take courses at ASU to augment my skills and the requirements of the positions I held beginning in 2000 and continuing into 2013.
Director, Chairperson for the Development Committee

The YWCA Maricopa County is dedicated to eliminating discrimination, empowering women and promoting peace, justice, freedom and dignity for all.  For more than 100 years the YWCA has been dedicated to supporting women, American Veterans, and our local communities with critical social and educational services.  We are committed to making a difference for those we serve!

Kathy has not only been an invaluable member of the EmpowHER Business Advisory Board, but has also been my personal CEO / President mentor-in-residence. Being a busy member of the executive leadership team for a fast-growth company like EmpowHER has left me little time for much by way of professional development. Kathy's steadfast, confident, and clear leadership demeanor and coaching style has helped groom me into a better leader. Her patience, balanced approach to delivering feedback, and thoughtful perspective are just a few of her gifts. The blend of strategic thinker, shrewd tactician and diplomat that she is, is a model for leadership today. Any company or executive would be lucky to have her on their team. I'm just blessed she's been on mine for nearly two years, and I hope for the rest of my career.

Tammy Valdez
Member Board of Directors at MentorKids USA
November 29, 2011, Tammy worked with Kathy but at different companies

I am endorsing Mrs. Kathy Hanrahan as a valuable strategic partner.  I have known her for 2 years. Kathy worked with me as our interim CFO, as a consultant on my Retention Task Force, Enterprise PMO and finally as an Executive Coach. Kathy has been a tremendous asset to my organizations and LifeLock®. Kathy was a key consulting member of my Retention Task Force at LifeLock.   The theme of her composition is consistent: drawing the best out of people and identifying actionable business strategy out of financial results. She is highly capable of driving business results, doing detailed analysis, gleaning actionable solutions and presenting them in an articulate/compelling manner. She helped establish a strategy through Prado analysis combined with a cross functional systematic approach. The results are still being realized, while we have already had a tremendous impact on the bottom line.Kathy is adept at understanding others’ perspective; she convincingly pulls relevant personal experiences to eloquently influence change.  Her style is one of leveraging empowerment and encouragement to direct a symphony of performance results. She is a valuable asset to any team because of her talent of establishing solidarity among colleagues.  Kathy is very genuine and persuasive in her approach, a strategic thinker that anticipates obstacles during her planning allowing for smooth execution. Kathy’s competence, passion, interpersonal skills and integrity have enabled her to achieve what 1% of women achieve in a lifetime.

Steve Mercier
President, Innovative Operational Solutions, Inc.
August 15, 2010, Steve reported directly to Kathy

It takes enormous vision and teamwork to bring a product to market, much less laying the foundation for exponential growth. Founders Rick & Tom Smith recruited Kathy very early in the companies conception to establish and build out the systematic infrastructure of TASER.  Kathy strategically designed, developed and implemented operational excellence standards related to core departments (Controller, HR, Administration, Manufacturing and Sales) within TASER.  Kathyserved as Controller, CFO, President and COO, and took the company through the difficult IPO process.  During this time, she was one of the key spokespersons for TASER within all public facing social medias.  Kathy is an influential and passionate Executive Officer, who embodies ethics, integrity, professionalism and accountability to the corporate team and stock holders.  Kathy mentors and reinforces that corporate success begins and ends with each and every employee.  It was a privilege to work for and with Kathy during our joint time at TASER. Kathy has expanded her expertise and is now CEO of New Horizon's Management, Inc.  I look forward to working with Kathy in the future and without question, I highly endorse Kathy as an Executive Officer and mentor.

I have had the distinct honor, and pleasure of working with Jose for more than a decade and can tell you without hesitation, he elevates any organization lucky enough to employ him!During our tenure together, at both TASER and Guardian 8, he fully embraced the role of “customer advocate” ensuring each and every customers’ need for service was balanced with the organization’s vision to grown and thrive.  No task was ever beneath him, nor was any challenge too large.  He is a problem solver, a professional, and the very definition of a team player.To summarize, if you or your organization are looking for a proven leader, who understands how to build a customer centric organization, and a strategic thinker you can rely on to help grow your business, I can recommend no person more qualified or suited, than Jose.

summary: How Kathy and New Horizons can help you achieve success...New Horizons can augment your staff, while reducing overhead expenses by providing subcontracted consulting services from proven leaders.  We can provide guidance, and oversight to your existing teams, as well as work with senior leadership to define strategies, and execute critical objectives to improve your overall operations.New Horizon's is an AZ corporation, whose mission is to provide quality management services to young businesses in the Valley of the Sun.  "Arizona has provided me with a wonderful career, working for three amazing companies in the construction, aerospace and high tech manufacturing industries.  My goal, as the Founder and CEO for New Horizon's Management is to share that knowledge with new CEO's and company leaders in an effort to continue growing the economy for our great State and our families."​Let us help you analyze your existing operations, and work side by side with you to define your next steps, and the measurements to ensure you achieve success.What We Do:Our services can be contracted on an hourly, project, or retainer basis to support your operations.  Please call us for a free customized proposal for services.Corporate Structure	Evaluations of existing people, roles and critical functions.Financial Analysis & Operational Assessment	Analysis of key metrics and performance ratios critical to your organization's success.Advisory Board Assistance	High level critical thinking, and leadership skills to augment your existing management strengths.Coaching Services	Ongoing support to ensure your team stays on track with strategic plans.Hear what our clients are saying:    "LifeLock has really grown during the short time Kathy as served as Interim CFO. Coming in during a critical transition stage, her positive influence and financial expertise made an immediate impact and will be felt for years.  She was also instrumental in refocusing the team on key initiatives. "Specialties: Financial analysis and reporting, diverse operations expertise in high growth technology oriented business, and more than 25 years in all aspects of leadership within a dynamically growing business environment.
name: Kathy Hanrahan
title: Founder-CEO, New Horizon's Management Consulting
